fpmExplorer:Page.title: Tree Table
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The TreeTable building block enables you to render a table with hierarchical data.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Hierarchy Definition
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The Aggregation.RecursiveHierarchy and @Hierarchy.RecursiveHierarchy defines the hierarchy of the tree table.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: LineItem Definition
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: The UI.LineItem annotation defines the columns of the table.
